snippet: Marie Colvin, a journalist from Long Island, was killed on Feb. 22 in Syria and mourned by friends and colleagues at her hometown church on Monday.
abstract: Marie Colvin, Sunday Times of London journalist from Long Island who was killed on February 22 in Syria, is mourned by friends and colleagues at her hometown church.
lead_paragraph: Marie Colvin, a journalist from Long Island, was killed on Feb. 22 in Syria and mourned by friends and colleagues at her hometown church on Monday.

headline.seo: Marie Colvin, Reporter Killed in Syria, Is Mourned at Funeral
headline.main: At Funeral, Recalling Many Sides of Reporter
headline.print_headline: At Reporter's Funeral, a Young Wild Streak Is Recalled
